On this sunny Tuesday of November 14th, the mercury is warming up to a comfortable 23°C, as if nature itself is giving us a warm hug. 🌞 Just like today, but with an extra sprinkle of autumn charm – expect crisp leaves rustling underfoot and gentle breezes that carry hints of pumpkin spice in the air.
